attributes.action: Stop UK Travel Agents Cheat With The Customers !
attributes.additional_details:
Ban big amount of money in cash to be paid to UK Hajj Travel Groups & pay by bank card instead which very safe & protected by law & also to protected all UK Hajj Pilgrims goes to Hajj every year from UK to Saudi Arabia.

The UK Hajj Travel Groups stop Bullying the UK Hajj Pilgrims during they stay for Hajj.
